Articles.Content: Is there a website or place where you can get old versions of ksp like 0.7.1 0.15 etc? id like to play back in the good ol days
0.15 was a paid version, but you should be able to get all copies up to .13.3
some one had a thread collecting all the versions up to .15 i'm not sure what happened to. i think it was removed when the forum crashed back in April

There is no public archive of the old versions, but many of the users around here have personal archives.

I've got KSP version 0.10.1 for Windows. Get it while it's hot!
Cool! Thanks, Ill have fun playing the old classic ksp

Gentlemen: a link to the forum topic containing (almost) all old versions which was mentioned two posts above.
